com.vmware.o11n.sdk.rest.client
Interface VcoSession

public interface VcoSession

Represents a a connection to the vCO server for a user. A VcoSession object cannot be shared between different users as it carries the user's authentication. The VcoSession is thread-safe and can be reused for multiple requests and be safely put in and HttpSession.
